metadata.title: CVE-2020-17367 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Firejail through 0.9.62 does not honor the -- end-of-options indicator after the --output option, which may lead to command injection.

criterions.comment: firejail package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.62-4').
